data.text:
---------------------------------------------------------

Text Resume

---------------------------------------------------------

NHGarner@gmail.com

Nickolas H. Garner www.linkedin.com/in/nickolashgarner/

Houston, TX • 713 -828 -1744

Account Manager

A highly accomplished solution sales professional, with extensive experience building sales

pipelines and realizing transformational revenue growth for leading energy, construction, and

manufacturing organizations . Harness customer focus, strategic thinking, and commercial acumen with

strong communication and active listening, to fine -tune business development strategies, augment pre –

sales knowledge, resolve customer pain points, and win business.

Areas of Expertise

• Team Leadership

• Sales Strategy

• Key Account Management

• Customer Acquisition

• Market Penetration

• Oil & Gas

• Digital Twin

• Market Share/Revenue Growth

• Project Management

• Sales Playbooks & Sales Scripts

• Contract Negotiations

• Stakeholder Relationships

• Renewable Energy

• Transformation

• Problem Solving

• Cross -Functional Collaboration

• Presentations & Pitches

• Marketing & Brand Awareness

• SaaS

• Construction

• Digitalization

Key Accomplishments

• Negotiated an enterprise agreement with super major valued at $ 5M with Environmental Intellect

• Generated $500,000 per annum by closing Shell Gulf of Mexico account for Cumulus Digital

Systems.

• Booked $1.2 million in sales/leases within 12 months at Briggs Equipment.

• Led successful completion of final stages of $750 million dollar Sarofim Hospital extension project

at Broaddus & Associates.

• Track record of maximizing sVWHPVDYDLODELOLWGHVSLWHWLJKWEXGJHWV

Car ee r Experience

Account Executive, Environment al Intellect , Nampa , ID

Aug 202 3 – Present

Sold into the O&G a nd Petrochem industr y, primary customers are tu rnarou nd groups.

● Average deal size of $ 220,000

● Worked on $ 5M enterprise agreement with supermajor

● 80/20 new business and account management , worked with customer success team to

ensure positive project outcome.

Account Executive, Cumulus Digital Systems , Cambridge, MA

Feb 2022 – Aug 2023

Sold construction and manufacturing SaaS solutions to key accounts in oil, gas, and technology

sectors. Target, approach, and identify pain points of prospects, then offer solutions that meet

objectives and win business. Devise tools that expedite completion of sales and encompass strategy

and lead enrichment.

● Average deal size of $180,000

● Won Shell Gulf of Mexico account worth $500,000 per annum, comprising provision of

services to all rigs in Gulf.

● Converted first renewable energy client.

Southwest Regional Sales Manager, McCue Corporation , Danvers, MA

Aug 2020 – Feb 2022

Led sales of warehouse safety products, including bollards, dock equipment, and pedestrian barriers,

operating across territory spanning California to Louisiana. Determined and targeted prospects in

several markets ranging from food and beverage manufactur ing/distribution, contract logistics, and

large manufacturing. Oversaw entire lifecycle of sales process – from lead generation, needs audits,

and proposals to delivery and aftersales.

● Boosted sales by 27% and expanded territory by 20%.

● Closed major new accounts, including Toyota and Ben E. Keith.

Industrial Sales, Briggs Equipment , Houston, TX (Contract Role)

Jul 2019 – Aug 2020

Defined optimum customer personas, researched refineries, oilfield equipment manufacturers, and

large fabrication facilities, then identified and targeted contacts. Converted sales of trucks with

capacities upwards of 35,000lbs. Negotiated contracts, arran ged delivery of vehicles, overseeing

logistics in collaboration with clients and colleagues.

● $1.2 million in business booked, mixture of sales, leases, and service contracts

Owner’s Representative, Broaddus & Associates , Houston, TX (Contract Role)

May 2018 – Jul 2019

Supported delivery of Memorial Hermann Healthcare contract, ensuring all deliverables realized on

time, to budget, and agreed specifications, acting on behalf of Owner.

● Coordinated final stages and closeout of $750 million dollar Sarofim Hospital extension

project.

Field Project Representative II, AEI Engineering LLC , Houston, TX (Contract Role) Feb

2018 – May 2019

Assigned to Water, Wastewater, and Civil Infrastructure projects, conducted comprehensive

inspections of engineering works, to ensure quality standards, building codes and regulatory

requirements met. Drafted constructability reviews and reviews of as -buil ts.

● Took ownership of project quality on government projects.

● Saved district over $1 million in rework costs by identifying deficiency in contractor’s work

and ensuring remediation was executed. Outside Sales Representative, Southwest Wire Rope , Houston, TX Feb

2016 – Feb 2018

Built sales pipeline and maximized prospect touch points to close sales. Penetrated new market

sectors and took ownership of accounts in heavy civil, petrochemical construction, offshore, and

transportation sectors. Achieved full sales potential of clients .

● Onboarded 70 new clients during tenure.

● Increased average spend of existing accounts by 15%.

● Won contract to supply all drill lines to Patterson UTI and Nabors.

Studying for Degree

May 2012 – Dec 2014

Information Management Officer, ITT Exelis , Kandahar, Afghanistan

Oct 2010 – May 2012

Sales Engineer, Silicon Graphics , Houston, TX

May 2009 – Sep 2010
